result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Casimir Richard Bartold III

defendant.name: Bartold, Casimir Richard, III
defendant.address: 5165 N Main Street PO Box 38, Winter, WI 54896

records.addlTxt:
9:21 AM Defendant Casimir Richard Bartold III in court.  Attorney Fredric B. Anderson in court for Casimir Richard Bartold III.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.   Attny Anderson indicates to proceed with preliminary hearing.    State calls witness, Sawyer County Deputy Michael Simpson, sworn in by court.   State begins examination.   9:39 AM  Witness identified the DEF, court indicates the record will reflect.  State continues examination.  9:41 AM  Cross-Examination by Attorney Anderson.   Attny Anderson no further questions.  9:44 AM  Witness excused.   No further witness.   State request for bind over.  Attny Anderson opposed to bind over  Court finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Arraignment scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:44 AM Defendant Casimir Richard Bartold III in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.   Court enters NG Plea to Counts 2 and 3.    DEF indicates wants to have attorney, Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy.   Court sets preliminary hearing.   Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.

8:44 AM Defendant Casimir Richard Bartold III in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address.  State makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond.   SIBS $2500  No Contact with  W.B.  6/29/1975.  DEF to report to jail for fingerprints.  Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
